content: join my facebook group for community coupons and cal challenges take me to the group 1 crochet this fast and fun hanging plant holder great for herbs flowers or your favorite plant yarn bernat handicrafter medium weight #4 yarn 100% cotton 80 yds/73 m per 1 75 oz/50 g skein hot green x 1 skeins materials us size h/8 5 mm crochet hook scissors flower pot 4-7 tall x 4-7 wide 2 hook screw gauge 17 double_crochet sts = 4 5 double_crochet row = 3 5 sizes/finished measurements base diameter 7 full hanging height length 23 stitch key chain s = chain s single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet st s = stitch es slip_stitch = slip_stitch specialty stitches & techniques adjustable loop notes pattern is worked in joined rounds from the bottom up including the chain loops for hanging 1 https //www facebook com/groups/groupsalenabacacrochet/
